name: Disaster Dinner
description:
It’s time for dinner! You’re a relative of Death and it's their first time hosting a family dinner.  Death is really hoping to make a good impression now that they’re on their own and finally playing host, but being the baby of the family does have its downsides. It seems like everyone is purposely trying to ruin the evening! Try to survive their attacks and hopefully fire back when you get the chance!

A silly gothic style game where a group of four players compete in two teams to see who can make the others lose all their dignity first.

https://playingcards.io/8eyed5
